title: Returns Are a Headache. More Retailers Are Saying, Just ‘Keep It.’
excerpt: In a survey, nearly 60 percent of retailers said they had policies that refund customers for items that aren’t financially viable to send back.
highlights:
Highlight:Fifty-nine percent of retailers have keep-it policies for items that aren’t financially viable to ship back, according to a 2023 survey on holiday shopping trends by goTRG, now called ReturnPro, a firm that helps retailers including Walmart manage returns. Most companies don’t advertise the policy prominently.

Highlight:for every $1 billion in sales, the average retailer sustained $145 million in returns.

Highlight:About 64 percent of items that were eligible for such returns cost less than $20,

Highlight:83 percent were under $30.

title: GoodwillFinds.com gives shoppers more reasons to feel good about buying sec
excerpt: A new recommerce venture offers all of the benefits of buying second hand plus a means to help fund social service programs in local communities, such as job training and youth mentorship. title: Retail’s ‘Dark Side’: As Inventory Piles Up, Liquidation Warehouses Are Busy (Published 2022)
excerpt: Consumers are buying fewer discretionary goods and returning more. To clear their shelves, retailers are selling to liquidators at steep discounts.

title: How ceramics brand East Fork transitioned to a pre-sale only model
excerpt: 2020 was the year East Fork ceramics planned to become profitable. Now, that's likely no longer on the table, but the company is using a new model to better handle its balance sheet: pre-sales. Now, new product lines will all be for sale before they're manufactured, as a way to get capital in as early as possible.

title: 4 Online Merchandising Hacks to Increase Profits
excerpt: Retailers seek to avoid markdowns and sell out of the season at full margin, but it isn’t easy to predict how much inventory to acquire. In this post, I'll address four online merchandising tactics that balance consumer demand with inventory levels, to maximize profits.
